translated: The countless people who had been practicing virtue attained the acceptance of the non-arising of all things

original: rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to //
analyzed: rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to //
translated: and experienced constant happiness.

analyzed: tshe 'pho bar 'gyur ba tshad med pa snyed ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skyes nas /
translated: The countless beings who had been reborn in other realms were born in the pure buddha-lands

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i grogs su gyur to //

translated: the entire assembly returned to their own abodes

original: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed cing /
